description:
Shark® delivers its most advanced and easiest-to-use Steam Mop ever, incorporating a Spray Pocket mop option so you’ll have the right solution for all your cleaning needs, from everyday quick cleanups to whole-room deep cleaning, with just one system.

The Shark Genius Steam Mop not only cleans your floors amazingly well, but also goes further to sanitize* your sealed hard floors, eliminating 99.9% of common household bacteria.

With the new Genius Mop Head with touch-free technology, there’s no more getting your hands dirty while mopping or scrubbing for stains; no more wringing out mops or wrestling with dirty pads. With a simple pinch of a button, you can attach a clean pad and start mopping in seconds. When you are done, just pinch the button again and the dirty pad releases automatically—you won’t have to lay a finger on it.

You’ll get extra-targeted steam power with our new Steam Blaster technology. Just flip the mop head over and tilt the mop handle back to activate the Steam Blaster: a powerful burst of targeted steam that attacks and loosens tough, stuck-on messes, removing them quickly and effortlessly.

Shark’s new Dirt Grip pads have been designed to absorb more liquid than any of our previous pads, and to generate better engagement with the floor surface. With the Dirt Grip design and durable construction, you’ll achieve a great cleaning performance. And when finished, simply drop the pad in the wash and reuse. Our Dirt Grip pads are designed to give an amazing clean even in those tough-to-handle spots.

* Sanitization studies were conducted under controlled test conditions. Household conditions and results may vary. With Genius Mop Head only when used with steam mop. Not when using Steam Blaster. See Owner's Guide for instructions.
title: Shark® Genius™ Steam Pocket® Mop System

bullets: Lightweight mop is easy to move around your space
Steam mop sanitizes your floors while cleaning
Touch-free technology lets you attach or remove mop pad without using your hands
Washable mop pads can be reused for convenience

Choose between washable mop pads for everyday messes or disposable Swiffer BISSELL® SteamBoost mop pads for pet messes you want to throw away. Keep your hands clean with the innovative Drop-IT tank emptying system. Plus, keep your pet friendly home free of harmful chemicals by using the power of steam to sanitize* your floors – all you need is water.

description: The BISSELL Steam Shot hard surface cleaner uses high pressure steam to deal with stubborn dirt and cleans the area without using harsh chemicals. It has a high-capacity water tank so that you can use it longer without refilling. The cleaner has a steam-on-demand trigger for treating tougher stains. It has a 16' power cord that allows easy cleaning of larger areas. Plus, this cleaner can be used as a fabric steamer to refresh garments and remove wrinkles. The BISSELL multipurpose cleaner comes with a grout brush, angle concentrator, fabric steamer tool and cloth, flat scraping tool and 3 detail brushes. It also has a window squeegee, measuring cup and an owner's manual to get you started. The handheld steam cleaner can be used for cleaning all kinds of surfaces, including sinks, refrigerators, stoves, shower doors and windows.

Using ordinary water heated to over 200ºF, the MC1275 effectively and naturally cleans and sanitizes a wide variety of surfaces. Its large 48 oz. water tank heats up in less than 8 minutes and provides up to 45 minutes of continuous steam. The MC1275 comes equipped with 18 versatile accessories including a floor mop attachment for use on sealed flooring surfaces. An extra-long 15-foot power cord assures easy portability. Backed by a 2-year warranty and supported in Andover, Kansas.

description: The Shark® Professional Steam Pocket® Mop featuring Intelligent Steam Control®offers superior cleaning and 99.9% sanitization for all of your hard floor surfaces and cleaning needs. Ready to use in 30 seconds, its Intelligent Steam Control® provides two settings of variable steam with continuous delivery. Select more steam for tough cleaning tasks like stuck-on dirt or heavy-traffic areas, and less steam for everyday cleaning, gentle dusting, or more delicate surfaces. The Shark® Professional Steam Pocket® Mop also includes double-side, micro-fiber Steam Pocket® pads, which allow you to cover twice the cleaning area with a quick flip of the steam head. Plus, its XL water capacity allows you to mop longer without stopping. You can't go wrong with the Shark® Professional Steam Pocket® Mop. It delivers the right amount of steam at the perfect temperature to clean, sanitize, and dry in seconds. It leaves surfaces cleaner than a traditional mop-and-bucket, which simply moves dirty water around the floor.

description: The BLACK+DECKER BDH1855SM 10-n-1 Steam Mop with Fresh Scent is perfect for multiple uses and cleaning multiple types of materials; Designed to be used on floors, kitchen, toilets, clothes, windows, grease stains, grout lines, shower stalls, faucets, toys. Kills 99.9% of germs using only water - no chemicals required. This steam mop is safe to use on sealed hardwood floors; with Digital Smart Select Technology right in your hand, you just simply select the specific floor type - Wood/Tile/Stone - and the mop automatically releases the right amount of steam. The Burst of Steam button releases up to 50% more steam for tough stains (when using the microfiber pad attachments). It features ready-to-go tank illumination that changes from red to blue when the water reaches the correct temperature. This unit can accept a scent tab so as you use the steamer, it emits a fresh lemon scent. As an added bonus, it has a removable hand held steam cleaner for cleaning counters, bathrooms, cooking surfaces and more. Great for homes with kids or pets.  The 25' cord allows you to complete most rooms without having to stop to move the cord. Includes: (1) Steam Mop, (2) Microfiber Steam Mop Pads, (1) 3.5 ft. description: The Ewbank All-In-One Floor Cleaner, Scrubber and Polisher is the professional way to achieve top quality finish for hard floors. The EP170 is suitable for all floor types, including laminate, wood, vinyl, marble and granite. The lightweight, easy to maneuver design is perfect for living rooms, kitchens and other medium to large spaces. Constructed of high impact material that is built to last, this high powered machine cleans, scrubs and polishes a 9.5-inch path with twin contra-rotating discs spinning at 2,200-rpm. The 23-foot long power cord provides extra mobility. Other features include a 160-Watt motor, an onboard cord storage area, telescopic handle and a butterfly grip for extra stability. The EP170 includes (2) nylon bristle scrubbing brush plates, (2) hook and loop backing plates and (3) pairs of interchangeable and reusable microfiber cleaning and polishing pads, to keep your natural floors looking beautiful. The EP170 is non damaging to delicate floors. The Ewbank EP170 All-In-One Floor Cleaner, Scrubber and Polisher comes with a 1-year limited warranty that protects against defects in materials and workmanship. Ewbank has been providing innovative cleaning solutions for an impressive 125-years. Innovative design, reliability and customer satisfaction are always top priority, making Ewbank a staple in most households.
title: Ewbank Floor Polisher
bullet_description: Item Type: Laundry, Cleaning, Closet: Floor polishers

description: Clean every surface in your home with this steam cleaner from SteamFast. With professional steam power, it removes odors and allergens including dirt, pet hair and more. This heavy-duty steam cleaner has an upholstery brush and scrub brushes to clean and sanitize your floors without chemicals. It cleans upholstery, carpet and hardwood with ease. This handy home appliance has a 16" cord and casters for mobility. Owner's manual included.
title: SteamFast Steam Cleaner - SF-275

The worst dirt in your house is no match for the powerful 1,500-watt SteamFast Steam Cleaner
Ready to use in minutes, this steamer is easy to move wherever you need to clean
Steam, clean, mop and sanitize your floor with no chemicals needed
Reduces smoke and other odors, as well as allergens such as dust mites and pet dander

description: The Ewbank Steam Dynamo for Cleaning without Chemicals is a powerful steam cleaner that uses steam to eliminate grease, dirt, mold and stains. The Steam Dynamo is small, lightweight, and easy to carry or wheel around. With multiple attachments, the Dynamo is perfect for floor to ceiling cleaning. The stream-on-demand trigger allows the nozzle to steam when and where you want it or it locks into place for a constant steam. The Dynamo features an easy access, on-board storage compartment at the front of the steamer for quick and easy access to all attachments. This model includes a floor head cleaner with brush, a window/tile cleaner, nylon brush and mini nylon brush, push button nozzle adapter with jet nozzle, 2 extension tubes, water jug and funnel and a towel bonnet. This model has a 50-ounce tank capacity for 45-minutes of steam cleaning. Ewbank has a heritage to be proud of, we are a household favorite and a much-loved brand in the UK that has been providing innovative cleaning solutions for over 130 years. Innovative design, reliability and customer satisfaction are always top priority and have been our continued strength against our competitors. Our multipurpose products, including floor polishers, vacs and steam cleaning solutions are all offered at affordable prices, meaning that Ewbank is always the practical solution to everyday cleaning.
title: Ewbank Steam Dynamo Multi-tool Steam Cleaner
bullet_description: Features: 3 steam settings, Cord Wrap, Removable Nozzle
Item Type: Laundry, Cleaning, Closet: Steam cleaners
Recommended Surface Application: Carpet, Upholstery, Outdoor surfaces, Hard Floor, Hardwood

description: The BLACK+DECKER BDH1725SM Smart Select® Steam Mop kills 99.9% of germs using just water - no chemicals required.  This steam mop is great for homes with kids or pets.  With Smart Select® Technology, select the specific floor type - wood/tile/stone - and the mop automatically releases the right amount of steam.  This unit is safe to use on sealed hardwood floors.  It features a large removable water tank for convenient refilling and the ready-to-go tank illumination changes from red to blue when the water reaches the correct temperature.  With swivel steering, you can easily maneuver around furniture and into corners and the easy-glide washable microfiber pad effortlessly glides across the floor locking in dirt and grime.  The pad is machine washable and reusable for extended life and the hands-free pad removal makes it easy to change pads by simply stepping on the pad.  The steam mop automatically shuts off the steam when parked upright for those quick pauses during cleaning and it stands upright on its own or hangs on a wall for convenient storage.  Package includes: (1) Steam Mop with 23 ft. cord, and (2) Washable Microfiber Pads (model SMP20).  2 Year Limited Warranty.
title: BLACK+DECKER™ Smart Select® Steam Mop - White BDH1725SM
bullet_description: Features: 3 steam settings, Heat Indicator Light, Heated Cleaning, LED Lights, Portable, Swivel Mop Head, Cord Wrap, Carry Handle, Edge Cleaning, Electronic Steam with Auto Shut-off, Lightweight Construction, digital controls, Removable Tank, Steam on Demand Trigger

description: The Polti Vaporetto Handy Portable Steam Cleaner is proven to disinfect with just ordinary tap water — no need to use chemicals.  The portability of this lightweight unit simply can’t be beat thanks to its convenient shoulder strap and long power cord, making it easy to maneuver. This steam cleaner comes with a broad assortment of accessories for every part of your home. Special accessories allow you to clean virtually every type of flooring and carpets plus countertops, sinks, bathrooms, tile, grout, glass of all kinds, barbeques, outdoor patio furniture, car interiors, wheels, windows and pet products. The steam boiler reaches 275 degrees Fahrenheit at a high pressure of 43.5 pounds per square inch — sufficient to totally kill staph, salmonella, E. coli, fungus that causes athlete’s foot and ringworm, bacteria that causes sepsis and pneumonia, and the flu.
title: Polti Vaporetto Handy Portable Steam Cleaner

description: Easily clean, deodorize, and sanitize your home with Nugent STEAMPAC+ Handheld Steam Cleaner. Nugeni's innovative cleaning system is scientifically proven to eliminating dust mites, germs, bacteria, and unwanted viruses without the use of harsh chemicals. The patented high efficiency boiler system delivers super-fast steam while giving you complete control over your cleaning. The adjustable steam output lets you select the proper amount of steam for any cleaning job -  from delicate curtains to tough stainless steel – and everything in between. Pressurized steam effortlessly lifts caked on dirt and grime, with no scrubbing.  Includes a wide range of steam cleaning accessories, including a shoulder strap and unique steam extension hose with rotating handle for the ultimate in convenience and versatility. With the included attachments, you can clean most anything - from fabric to toys, floors to appliances. Let the STEAMPAC+ do the heavy work, even in the dirtiest and hardest to reach places.

The Flex steam mop offers powerful steam cleaning in a small, compact unit with an adjustable height handle. The Flex steam mop is steaming and ready to go in few seconds, produces superheated steam to kill germs, bacteria, and viruses leaving hard floor surfaces Sanitized. The steam stop feature quickly stops the flow of steam when the Flex mop is put in the upright and locked position, steam resumes when handle is unlocked allowing you to clean with confidence. The Flex steam mop is safe, ideal to use in households with pets, children, and allergy sufferers. The high temperature steam eliminates the need for chemical cleaners. The Flex steam mop leaves floors Sanitized and bacteria free using only superheated steam.

description: The Ewbank Cha-Cha 2 Rechargeable Upright and Handheld Cordless Duster Buffer cleans, dusts and buffs floors and other hard surfaces around the home. The duster is portable, easy-to-use and has a large cleaning head that rotates at 120-rpm. The CFP700 is suitable for mirrors, glass, shower screens, work surfaces, tile walls and many more. The lightweight, duster weighs 2-pounds and features an adjustable, telescopic handle to convert the Cha-Cha 2 into a hand-held unit. The quick release system converts the duster from an upright position to a handheld position with ease. The rechargeable battery has a 40-minute run-time on a full 4-hour charge. The CFP700 includes a washable thick padded microfiber coral pad and soft plush buffing pad to attract dust and save you time whilst cleaning your home. The Ewbank CFP700 Cha-Cha 2 Rechargeable Upright and Handheld Cordless Duster Buffer comes with a 1-year limited warranty that protects against defects in materials and workmanship. Ewbank has been providing innovative cleaning solutions for an impressive 125-years. Innovative design, reliability and customer satisfaction are always top priority, making Ewbank a staple in most households. Ewbank's multi-purpose products, including floor polishers, vacs and steam cleaning solutions are all offered at affordable prices, meaning that Ewbank is always the practical solution to everyday cleaning.

description: The Polti Vaporetto Focus Steam Cleaner is ideal for those having little time to dedicate to daily cleaning but want clean, hygienic floors. This steam mop is ready in only 30 seconds and thanks to the built-in triangle scrub brush, it reaches even the less accessible corners. Use the supersize two-in-one mop with broad rectangle brush for maximum efficiency for hard floors and carpets. Use the foot lever to detach the triangle brush with scrubbing bristles for hard to reach areas. The removable water tank is transparent and allows for quick and convenient refill. The anti-limescale filter allows you to use tap or distilled water. The Vaporetto Focus can stand alone and comes with a resting mat to use on delicate surfaces while it is still hot. Washable (hand wash only) scrubbing cloth is made of microfibers with scrubbing stripes that help guide the mop on linoleum and other hard surfaces. The other washable (machine washable) microfiber cloth disperses hot steam, picks up debris, and can be used on carpet and hard surfaces.

description:
The unique design of the BISSELL® Symphony Pet combines a pet vacuum with a pet steam cleaner giving you the ability to vacuum pet hair and debris and steam clean your hard floors at the same time. Switch seamlessly between functions while cleaning with the Easy Touch Digital Controls so you can vacuum and steam clean at the same or separately based on your cleaning needs. Choose between washable mop pads for everyday messes or disposable Swiffer BISSELL® SteamBoost mop pads for pet messes you want to throw away. Keep your hands clean with the innovative Drop-IT tank emptying system. Plus, keep your pet friendly home free of harmful chemicals by using the power of steam to sanitize* your floors – all you need is water.
Add scent to your steam cleaning with the Spring Breeze Freshening Discs. Discs slip right into the steam mop pads for an optional whole room fresh scent. Comes in a pack of 8.
Use Spring Breeze or Eucalyptus Mint Demineralized Water in your steam mops to refresh your room by leaving behind a fragrance as you clean. BISSELL® demineralized waters do not leave behind any dulling residue.
The BISSELL® SymphonySteam Mop Pad Kit includes 1 washable soft pad and 1 washable scrubby pad for use on the BISSELL® Symphony All-in-One Vacuum and Steam Mop.
Swiffer BISSELL® SteamBoost disposable mop pads clean up your worst pet messes while leaving a fresh, open-window scent behind. The SteamBoost Kit comes with 1 SteamBoost tray4 disposable mop pads.
title: BISSELL® Symphony™ Pet Vacuum Collection
bullet_description: Item Type: Laundry, Cleaning, Closet: Steam cleaners
